scripts.dev: npm run ensure-python && npm run install-python-deps && (node scripts/check-videos.js || echo 'Skipping check-videos') && ./node_modules/.bin/next dev
scripts.build: npm run ensure-python && npm run install-python-deps && ./node_modules/.bin/next build
scripts.ensure-python: python3 --version || (echo 'Python 3 not found. Attempting to install...'; npm run install-python3)
scripts.install-python3: if [ "$OS" != "Windows_NT" ]; then (command -v apt-get && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y python3 python3-pip) || (command -v brew && brew install python3); else echo 'Windows: Please install Python 3 manually from https://www.python.org/downloads/' && exit 1; fi
scripts.install-python-deps: if [ "$OS" != "Windows_NT" ]; then chmod -R u+rw .; else icacls . /grant %username%:F /T; fi && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Python dependencies installed automatically on npm run dev/build/vercel-build. Manual install: pip3 install -r requirements.txt'
